thread.title: Higher energy costs contributed to a jump in Japanese inflation in November
thread.title_full: Higher energy costs contributed to a jump in Japanese inflation in November

author: Philip FONG
title: Higher energy costs contributed to a jump in Japanese inflation in November
text:
Higher energy costs contributed to a jump in Japanese inflation in November
- Philip FONG
- Updated
Tags
As featured on
Japanese inflation accelerated in November, with prices rising 2.7 percent on-year partly due to higher energy costs, government data showed Friday.
Japanese inflation accelerated in November, with prices rising 2.7 percent on-year partly because of higher energy costs, government data showed Friday.
